Story:
Nuan, a pretty nurse is engaged to Chai, a son from Wongwuttiporn family 
which is a very wealthy family that owns a huge mansion in town. Later, 
the mansion is given to Nuan and Chai as a wedding gift. Meanwhile, 
Khun Ying, Chai&#039;s mother wants to take over the mansion and trade it to 
someone to get money for her debts, so she tries to expel Nuan. Unexpectedly, 
Nuan is dead and comes back to the mansion as a vengeful ghost to haunt 
Khun Ying and the people who kill her.
